name: I Am Fragrant
description: Pale Pink petals with curled Deeper Pink petaloids Large, anemone form. Average growth. E-M. Light fragrance. (Hybrid 'Fragrant One' × Japonica 'Kramer's Supreme'). (N.Z. 2002 - J. Finlay).

name: I Believe
description: Frosted watermelon Red. Large, semidouble to loose peony form with wavy, fluted petals. Upright growth. M. (Reported to be similar to 'Mena Ladnier'). (U.S. 1959 - K. C. Ellsworth, Myrtle Beach, SC).

name: I Bird Variegated
description: Dark Red with White variegation. Large, peony form. Average, open, upright growth. E-L. (Formerly called JAY BIRD). (U.S. 1999 - Jay Ellis Jr., Keystone Hts., FL).

name: I-Wings
description: Medium Red. Large, formal double. Average, spreading, open growth. M-L. (U.S. 2019 - Pat Johnson, Cairo, GA).

name: I. C. Williams
description: Phlox Pink. Medium, single. Vigorous, upright, pendulous growth. E-L. (Saluenensis x Japonica). (England 1940 - Williams).

name: I. J. Whitfield
description: Dark Red. Medium, loose to full peony form. Vigorous, upright growth. E-M. (U.S. 1950 - Magnolia).

name: I. K. Variegated
description: Light Pink edged darker Pink. Medium semidouble. Vigorous, compact growth. M. (U.S. 1937 - Kiyono).

name: I. M. Haynie
description: Rose Pink. Large, semidouble. Vigorous, compact, upright growth. M. (U.S. 1977 - Haynie).

name: I. Morgan Sprott
description: Deep Cherry Red. Large, semidouble with loose irregular petals. Average, upright growth. L. (U.S. 1973 - J. M. Sprott, Elloree, SC).

name: I. Stewart Howard
description: Bright Red. Large, semidouble with large, crinkled, iridescent petals. Vigorous, compact, upright growth. E-M. (U.S. 1983 - R. Bond, Dallas, TX).

name: Ice Cream Smoothie
description: Deep Pink, shading from a near White center through Pale Pink. Medium, peony form. Slow, dense and spreading growth. M-L. (Pitardii seedling). (N.Z. 2004 - Haydon).

name: Ice Follies
description: Bright Pink. Large, semidouble. Average, dense, upright growth. L. Cold hardy to - 5°F. (Hybrid 'November Pink' × Oleifera 'Lu Shan Snow'). (U.S. 1992 - Ackerman).

name: Ice Melted
description: Light Pink with lighter center. Medium, semidouble. Vigorous, upright growth. M. Fragrant. (Hybrid 'Scentuous' seedling). (N.Z. 1991 -J. Finlay).

name: Ice Queen
description: White. Large, semidouble. Compact growth. M. (Aus. 1965).

name: Iced Fragrance
description: White. Large, semidouble to peony form. Slow, dense, upright growth. E-L. Fragrant. (Aus. 1990 - Mildorrie Camellias, Jasper's Brush, NSW).

name: Iceland
description: White. Large, semidouble with oval petals standing apart. Average, compact growth. M-L. (U.S. 1965 - Julington).

name: Ichiko-Wabisuke
description: Red with Light Yellow anthers and Whitish filaments. Small, single - campanulate. E-M. (Japan 1980's - Garden of Ueda Toshirô, Aichi-ken).

name: Ichiraku
description: White. Miniature, bell shaped single.

name: Ida Berg
description: Red. Very large, semidouble. Vigorous, upright growth. M. (Reticulata seedling x Reticulata 'Purple Gown'). (N.Z. 1973 - L. Berg, Whakatane).

name: Ida Cossom
description: Rose Pink. Very large, semidouble to peony form. Upright, open growth. M. (Reticulata hybrid 'LASCA Beauty' seedling). (Aus. 1984 - Sebire).

name: Ida Green
description: Rose Pink shaded Orange. Large, rose form double. Average, upright growth. E. (Saluenensis x Reticulata 'Crimson Robe'). (N.Z. 1983 - Mrs. I. Berg, Whakatane).

name: Ida King
description: Blush. Large, semidouble with stamens intermingled with petaloids. Vigorous, spreading growth. M. (U.S. 1969 - E. J. Prevatt, Bonneau, SC).

name: Ida May Johnston
description: White striped Pink. Large, semidouble to loose peony form. M. (U.S. 1961 - J. W. Bradford, San Diego, CA).

name: Ida Weisner
description: White. Large, semidouble with tight cluster of stamens in center. Vigorous, open, pendulous growth. E-M. (U.S. 1965 - Weisner).

name: Ida's Blush
description: Soft Pink at petal edges shading to Cream at center. Small, rose form double. Average, upright growth. M. (U.S. 1997 - E. and B. Achterberg, Citrus Heights, CA).

name: Ida's Joy
description: Glowing Red. Large, peony form. Average, upright growth. M-L. (Reticulata seedling). (N.Z. 1989 - Mrs. I. Berg, Whakatane).

name: Idalia
description: White with Pale Pink halo through center of each petal. Large, rose form double. Average, upright growth. E. (U.S. 1971 - J. Moon, Lake Charles, LA).

name: Idaten-Shibori
description: See 'Daikagura'.

name: Igloo
description: White. Large, full peony form. Average, upright growth. M. (U.S. 1965 - Breschini).

name: Ila Rester
description: Light Pink. Large, semidouble with wavy, crinkled petals. Average, upright, spreading growth. E-M. (U.S. 1968 - Rester).

name: Ilam Cherry
description: Bright Cherry Red. Very large, semidouble. Vigorous, upright growth. M. (Reticulata seedling). (N.Z. 1977 - Mrs. A. M. Coker, Christchurch).

name: Ilam Mist
description: Pink with darker veining. Large, semidouble. Average, upright, compact growth. E-L. (Reticulata seedling). (N.Z. 1973 - Mrs. A. M. Coker, Christchurch).

name: Ilam Satin
description: Red. Very large, anemone form to peony form. Slow, compact growth. M. (N.Z. 1975 - Mrs. A. M. Coker, Christchurch).

name: Illie Rountree
description: White striped Red. Medium to large, loose peony form. Average, open, upright growth. M-L. (U.S. 1997 - C. Elliott, Swainsboro, GA).

name: Illustrious
description: Brilliant Rose Pink. Medium to large, semidouble with broad, round, crinkled petals. Slow, compact growth. M. (U.S. 1950 - Short).

name: Ima-Kumagai
description: Bright Crimson. Medium, single. See Higo.

name: Imagination
description: Pure White. Medium to large, semidouble form with deeply fluted petals, and a waxy sheen. Vigorous, open, upright growth. M-L. (U.S. 2005 - Gordy).

name: Imbricata Rubra Plena
description: See 'Prince Eugene Napoleon'.

name: Imp
description: Dark Pink. Small to medium, formal double. Average, open, upright growth. M. (U.S. 1973 - Tammia).

name: Imperator (American)
description: Scarlet with Yellow anthers and Whitish filaments. Small to medium, semidouble. Vigorous, bushy growth. E. (U.S. 1945).

name: Imperator (France)
description: ('Big Daddy'). Dark Red. Large, full peony form. Average, open, upright growth. M. (France 1908 - Guichard).

name: Imperial Splendour
description: Deep Red. Large, semidouble to peony form with Golden stamens. Spreading, bushy growth. M-L. (Aus. 1980 - T. J. Savige, Wirlinga, NSW).

name: Imura
description: White. Medium to large, semidouble. Vigorous, open, willowy growth. M. (Reported to be same as 'Miyakodori'). (U.S. 1939 - Overlook).

name: In Loving Memory
description: Light Pink. Large to very large, semidouble to loose peony form. Rapid, average form growth. M-L. (Reticulata hybrid 'Gael's Dream' x. Sasanqua). (N.Z. 2007 - Haydon).

name: In The Pink
description: Rose Pink. Medium, formal double to rose form double. Vigorous, compact, upright growth. M-L. (U.S. 1971 - Kramer).

name: In The Pink Variegated
description: White striped Pink variation of 'In the Pink'. (U.S. 1977 - Kramer).

name: In The Pink Variegated (Weeks)
description: Rose Pink variegated White. Medium, rose form double to formal double. Vigorous, compact, upright growth. M-L. ('Virus variegated form of Japonica 'In the Pink'; 'not to be confused with 'In the Pink Variegated' - Pink with White stripes'). (U.S. 2019 - Tommy Weeks, Conroe, TX).

name: In The Purple
description: Dark to Purplish Red with darker veining Medium, peony form. Average growth. M-L. (N.Z. 1982 - Miss J. Farmer, Palmerston North).

name: In The Red
description: Rose Red. (Sport of Japonica 'In The Pink'). (U.S. 1975 - Kramer).

name: Inamorata
description: Rose Pink. Medium, single. Slow, open growth. (Saluenensis x Reticulata hybrid 'Wild Form'). (England 1950 - Hanger).

name: Inconstant Beauty
description: See 'Mathotiana Alba'.

name: India
description: Dawn Pink. Large, semidouble with loose, semi-upright petals. (U.S. 1956 - B L Kersey. Blythe Is., GA).

name: India Kruger
description: See 'Lady de Saumarez'.

name: Indian Chief
description: Red. Large, full peony form. Vigorous, upright growth. E-M. (U.S. 1958 - Shackelford).

name: Indian Chief Variegated
description: Red blotched White variation of 'Indian Chief'.

name: Indian Summer
description: Deep Rose Red. Large to very large, full peony form. Vigorous, upright growth. E-L. (U.S. 1955 - McCaskill).

name: Indian Summer Variegated
description: Deep Rose Red blotched White variation of 'Indian Summer'.

name: Indiscreet
description: White penciled Red with Red petaloids to Cream White penciled Pink with Pink petaloids to solid Red. Medium, peony form. Slow, compact, upright growth. E-M. (U.S. 1949 - S. W. Miller, El Cajon, CA).

name: Inez Moll
description: Deep Salmon Pink with Rose undertone. Large, anemone form to loose peony form with large, rounded petals and intermixed smaller, curved petals and low Golden stamens. Vigorous, open growth. E-M. (U.S. 1957 - Julington).

name: Innovation
description: Wine Red with Lavender overtones. Large, peony form with twisted fluted petals. Vigorous, slightly open growth. E- L. (Hybrid 'William's Lavender' x Reticulata 'Crimson Robe'). (U.S. 1965 - Feathers). - Reticulata - Phlox Pink. Medium, semidouble. (Reticulata x INSPIRATION Saluenensis). (England 1954 - Hanger).

name: Interlude
description: Light Pink. Small, rose form double to formal double.

name: Interval
description: Salmon Pink. Large to very large, single with high narrow cone of stamens. Bushy growth. M. (Japonica x Reticulata). (U.S. 1975 - Feathers)

name: Intoscent
description: Pink, shading from bright Pink tips to a Lighter Pink at center. Large, peony form. Vigorous, upright growth. M-L. Fragrant. (Hybrid 'Fragrant One' × Japonica 'Scentasia'). (N.Z. 2002 - J. Finlay).

name: Intoxicatingly Beautiful Red
description: ('Zuijiaohong' - Chinese Name). Carmine. Very large, semidouble with wavy petals. E. (Yunnan Reticulata). (China to U.S. 1980 - U. C. Bot. Gdn, CA).

name: Intrigue
description: Deep Red. Large, varies from single to full peony form. Vigorous, upright growth. M-L. (U.S. 1964 - G. C. Lecroy, Moncks Corner, SC).

name: Invictus
description: Dull Red. Medium, full peony form. M. (U.S. 1953 - Fruitland).

name: Iolet Weymouth
description: Rose fading to Silvery Pink. Unknown size, semidouble.

name: Irene
description: Pink with White mixed with Red stripes. Small, formal double. Average, spreading growth. M-L. (U.S. 1983 - A. Gonos, Fresno, CA).

name: Irene Bergamini
description: Vibrant medium Pink with Yellow anthers and White filaments. Medium to large, semidouble. Average, upright, spreading growth. M. (U.S. 2015 - Don Bergamini, Martinez, CA).

name: Irene Coker
description: White, lightly striped Pink, occasionally solid Pink. Medium, rose form double. Average, compact growth. E-M. (U.S. 1955 - B. F. Coker, Pensacola, FL).

name: Irene Coker Pink
description: Pink. (Sport of Japonica 'Irene Coker').

name: Irene Red
description: Red. Small, formal double. Average growth. (Sport of Japonica 'Irene').

name: Irene Rester
description: Currant Red. Large, semidouble to anemone to peony form. Vigorous, upright growth. E-M. (U.S. 1956 - Rester).

name: Irene Rester Variegated
description: Currant Red blotched White variation of 'Irene Rester'.

name: Irene's Pride
description: Light Pink in three shades. Large, peony form. Vigorous, upright growth. M. (U.S. 1977 - G. R. Blanton, Summerville, SC).

name: Iris
description: White with a few Pink strips. Medium, formal double. Upright growth. M. (Aus. 1848 - Baptiste & Son Nursery, Sydney).

name: Iris Laughead
description: Orchid Pink shaded Lavender. Large to very large, semidouble. Average, spreading growth. M. (Reticulata hybrid). (U.S. 1973 - Kramer).

name: Iris Shealy
description: Clear Pink with Yellow anthers and White filaments. Large to very large, anemone to semidouble to loose peony form. Average, bushy, dense growth. M. (U.S. 2022 - Gordy).

name: Irish Mist
description: Cherry Red. Large to very large, anemone form. Vigorous, upright growth. (U.S. 1982 - Mrs. M O'Malley, Woodside, CA).

name: Irma Judice
description: Rose Pink. Medium, semidouble to anemone form. Slow, upright, compact growth. E. (U.S. 1955 - Judice).

name: Irori-Bi
description: Deep Red. Medium, peony form.

name: Irrational Exuberance
description: White (typically 50-80%) with extensive Red veining at center with Yellow anthers and Flesh colored filaments. Medium to large, rose form double. Slow, spreading growth. M. (Japonica "Tama-no-ura' seedling). (U.S. 2014 - Bobby Green, Green Nurseries, Fairhope, AL).

name: Irving Corbett
description: Light Pink. Large, semidouble with upright, twisted, curled petals. Average, open, upright growth. M. (U.S. 1964 - Marbury).

name: Isaac Leach
description: Red with Yellow anthers and Red filaments. Very large, semidouble to loose peony form. Average, upright, open growth. E-M. (U.S. 2021 - Robert Williams, Charleston, SC).

name: Isabel
description: White. Medium, formal double. M-L. (For other forms of this cultivar see 'Yirgella' and 'Geoff Hamilton'). (Aus. 1868 - Macarthur).

name: Isabel Cordelia
description: Medium Pink and White with White anthers and White filaments. Miniature, single. Vigorous, upright growth. E. (Seedling of Hybrid 'Yume'). (U.S. 2016 - Tsubaki Camellias, Savannah, GA).

name: Isabel Hermann
description: Dark antique Red. Medium, peony form. Average, upright growth. M-L. (U.S. 1959 - B. J. Hermann, Mobile, AL).

name: Isabel Lewis
description: Light Pink. Large to very large, rose form double to loose peony. Average, upright, open growth. E-M. (Seedling of Japonica 'Marie Bracey'). (U.S. 2016 - Pat Johnson, Cairo, GA).

name: Isabel's Birthday
description: Light Pink shading to Hot Pink on edges with Yellow anthers and White filaments. Medium, semidouble to anemone to loose peony form. Average, upright, open growth. M-L. (Seedling of Japonica 'Snow Lady'). (U.S. 2022 - Pat B. Johnson, Cairo, GA).

name: Isabel's Discovery
description: Dark Rich Red with Yellow anthers and White filaments. Medium, full peony form. Slow, upright, open growth. M- L. (Seedling of Reticulata hybrid 'Frank Houser Variegated'). (U.S. 2022 - Pat B. Johnson, Cairo, GA).

name: Isabel's Surprise
description: White to Light Pink with Darker Pink streaks. Miniature, bell shaped single. Average, open, spreading, upright growth. E- M. (Hybrid seedling). (N.Z. 1992 - J. White, Whakatane).

name: Isaribi
description: Rose Pink. Miniature, semidouble. Vigorous, compact, upright growth. M-L. (Japonica 'Berenice Boddy' x other species). (U.S. 1981 - Parks).

name: Isla Warriner
description: Bright Red with occasional White variegation with Yellow anthers and Pale Pink filaments. Medium to large, semidouble form with almost Higo form stamens. Average, upright, medium density growth. M-L. (U.S. 2022 - Tom Warriner, Birmingham, AL).

name: Island Echo
description: See 'Red Wonder'.

name: Island Of Fire
description: Red. Large, semidouble. Average, open, upright growth. M. (U.S. 1965 - Novick).

name: Island Sunset
description: Rich Coral Pink, lighter at center. Medium to large, semidouble form. Average, bushy, upright growth. M-L. (U.S. 2006 - Nuccio's).

name: Isle Of Capri
description: Light Pink. Large, loose peony form. Vigorous, upright growth. M. (U.S. 1959 - Shackelford).

name: Itch
description: White with Yellow anthers and White filaments. Large, semidouble. Average, upright growth. E-M. (U.S. 2009 - William Brierly, Mobile, AL).

name: Itsukamachi
description: Red. Miniature to small, semidouble.

name: Itsukamachi Variegated
description: Red and White variation of ' Itsukamachi.'.

name: Itty Bit
description: Soft Pink. Miniature, anemone form. Slow, spreading growth. M. (Saluenensis x Hybrid 'Tiny Princess'). (N.Z. 1984 - F. E. Jury).

name: Ivan Mitchell
description: Dark Red. Large, rose form double to formal double. Average, upright growth. M-L. (Reticulata hybrid). (U.S. 1986 - Pursel).

name: Ivey Mae
description: Light Pink. Large, peony form. Average, compact growth. M. (U.S. 1957).

name: Ivory Tower
description: White. Large, formal double with high center to peony form. Average, compact growth. M. (U.S. 1966 - Shackelford).

name: Iwane
description: ('Iwane-Shibori'; 'F. G. #2'). Rose Red mottled White. Medium, semidouble. Slow, compact growth. M. (Japan 1891 - Yokohama).

name: Iwane-Shibori
description: See Iwane'.

name: Iza Houser
description: White. Large, semidouble. Vigorous, compact growth. M. (U.S. 1956 - M. R. Murray, Fort Valley, GA).

name: Izma
description: White with Pink on reverse side. Medium, semidouble.

name: Izume
description: Coral Pink. Medium, semidouble. Bushy, round growth. M-L.
